トピック.授業外学習2:
Weekly writing assignments can be expected, but all of them will be related to each student's research topic. Students will be developing parts of their thesis throughout the semester. At least 3 hours of weekly homework can be expected; however, the time spent in completing this course's assignments will significantly contribute to the completion of the student's thesis. Homework will be parallel to what students are already doing regarding their personal research development. You should have a stable wifi or internet connection at home to complete all out-of-class assignments.

** First-year graduate students who are considering this course but are still uncertain about their precise research topic and research methodology are strongly encouraged to take this course in their second year.
